pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conditional Random Fields for Labelling Sequential Data in Natural Language Processing // Wraps the 'CRFsuite' library https://github.com/chokkan/crfsuite allowing users to fit a Conditional Random Field model and to apply it on existing data. The focus of the implementation is in the area of Natural Language Processing where this R package allows you to easily build and apply models for named entity recognition, text chunking, part of speech tagging, intent recognition or classification of any category you have in mind. Next to training, a small web application is included in the package to allow you to easily construct training data.
